metadata.title: Vysion Horeca | All-in-One POS & Payment Platform
metadata.description: The complete POS system for hospitality. Cash register, online orders, invoicing, staff management and more - all in one platform. Try 7 days free.

hero.title: One screen. Full control.
hero.description: Born from practice, built by and for hospitality entrepreneurs. Perfect for snack bars, caf√©s, restaurants, butchers and bakeries. An all-in-one platform with a GKS-certified POS, your own ordering platform and professional SCARDA accounting software with Peppol invoicing, complete business analytics and so much more, compliant with legislation in Belgium and more than 20 other countries.
hero.trialInfo: Free trial 7 days ‚Ä¢ Get started immediately

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: One platform for all your hospitality needs. No separate systems, no hassle.

pos.title: Powerful POS
pos.description: Intuitive POS interface for fast service. Works on tablet, computer or touchscreen.

online.title: Online ordering
online.description: Online ordering platform with landing page for pickup and delivery. Customers order, you receive directly in the POS.

reports.title: Real-time reports
reports.description: Real-time X and Z reports. Instant insights into revenue, popular products and busy hours. Data-driven decisions.

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: Integrated payment terminal. Bancontact, Visa, Mastercard, Mollie, Stripe - all in one system.

invoicing.title: Invoicing & Peppol
invoicing.description: Professional Peppol invoices with one click. Automatically linked to your accounting. B2B shipping.

staff.title: Staff management
staff.description: Time registration, roles and permissions. You know exactly who did what. Ready for payroll submission.

kitchen.title: Kitchen display
kitchen.description: Real-time orders in the kitchen. Efficient and organized work.

loyalty.title: Customer card & Loyalty
loyalty.description: Build customer relationships with loyalty points and personal offers.

gks.title: GKS Certified
gks.description: 100% compliant with Belgian fiscal legislation. No worries, always in order.

orderApp.title: Everything you need
orderApp.subtitle: A complete ecosystem for your hospitality business. POS, ordering app, payment terminal and more.

features.2: Open your reports wherever you are

comparison.title: Compare with other platforms
comparison.subtitle: More features, lower price. Discover why Vysion Horeca is the best choice.

invoicing.title: Fast and professional invoicing.
invoicing.description: Create invoices for customers, credit notes and more. Connect directly with Peppol and send to the accountant in a fraction of seconds.

ordering.title: Fast handling, happy customers.
ordering.description: Process orders lightning fast during peak hours. No more queues. Everything perfectly integrated in the POS. Everything in real-time to the kitchen.

analytics.title: Real-time business analytics.
analytics.description: Know exactly how healthy your business is. Enter your fixed costs, supplier purchases, leases, rent and more. Get instant real-time analysis of your business.

accounting.title: Professional accounting.
accounting.description: SCARDA accounting software fully integrated. Always up-to-date. Save 30% on accounting costs.

1.quote: Finally a platform where everything is integrated. I cancelled all my other subscriptions and now have everything in one for a fraction of the price.
1.author: Marc V.

2.quote: The online ordering module increased our revenue by 40%. Customers love it.
2.author: Sarah D.

3.quote: Support responds within 5 minutes. I've never had that with any other supplier.
3.author: Kevin L.

4.quote: The best investment I've ever made for my business. Everything works perfectly together and customer service is excellent.
4.author: Lisa M.

5.quote: Finally a POS system in my own language! I searched for years and finally found it!
5.author: Wei Wang

6.quote: I've never had such a fast POS system. They even update overnight - I just press OK in the morning and the features I requested are already there!
6.author: James T.

about.heroSubtitle: Born from practice, built by hospitality entrepreneurs, for hospitality entrepreneurs.

story.title: Our story
story.p1: Vysion Horeca was born from experience. As hospitality entrepreneurs, we noticed that existing POS systems were too expensive, too complex, and never did exactly what we needed.
story.p2: We paid for five different subscriptions: a POS, an ordering platform, accounting software, a payment terminal and analytics software. Nothing worked well together and costs ran up to hundreds of euros per month.
story.p3: That's why we decided to build it ourselves. An all-in-one platform that does exactly what a hospitality entrepreneur needs, without hassle and at a fair price.

facts.foundedDesc: By hospitality entrepreneurs with more than 15 years of experience
facts.locationDesc: Pelt, Limburg - the heart of the Benelux
facts.countriesDesc: From Belgium to China, from Netherlands to the UK

mission.title: Our mission
mission.subtitle: Let hospitality entrepreneurs focus on what they do best: welcoming guests and creating great experiences. We take care of the rest.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: 99.9% uptime. Your POS always works, even when the internet drops.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Lightning-fast updates. Request a feature and see it in your system the next day.

personal.title: Personal
personal.description: No call centers. Direct lines with our team. We know every customer by name.

simplicity.title: üéØ Simplicity above all
simplicity.description: Technology should help you, not get in the way. That's why Vysion is so intuitive you can get started within 5 minutes - no manual needed.

pricing.title: üí∞ Fair pricing
pricing.description: No hidden costs, no long-term contracts, no surprises. What you see is what you pay.

improvement.title: üöÄ Continuous improvement
improvement.description: We listen to our customers and build what they need. New features are added every week, based on real feedback.

global.title: üåç Local and international
global.description: GKS-certified in Belgium, but also available in 9 languages and 20+ countries. From snack bar to Michelin restaurant.

company.title: Vysion Group International
company.p1: Vysion Horeca is part of Vysion Group International, a technology company specialized in software for the hospitality and retail sector.
company.p2: Besides Vysion Horeca, we also develop custom applications and digital solutions for companies that want to automate their processes.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They help us make the website work properly and improve your user experience.

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.content: These cookies are essential for the website to function. Without these cookies, certain functions cannot work.

functional.title: Functional cookies
functional.content: These cookies remember your preferences and settings to personalize your experience.

analytical.title: Analytical cookies
analytical.content: With your consent, we use analytical cookies to understand how visitors use our website. This helps us improve our services.

manageCookies.title: Managing cookies
manageCookies.content: You can adjust your cookie preferences at any time via your browser settings. Note: disabling certain cookies may limit the functionality of the website.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about our cookie policy, please contact us at

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Vysion Horeca, part of Vysion Group International, values the protection of your personal data. In this privacy statement, we explain what data we collect, why we do this and how we handle it.

whatData.title: 2. What data do we collect?
whatData.intro: We may collect the following personal data:

items.1: Name and contact details (email address, phone number)
items.2: Business details (company name, VAT number, address)

whyData.title: 3. What do we use your data for?

items.5: Communication about updates and new features
items.6: Compliance with legal obligations (including GKS, fiscal legislation)

security.title: 4. Data security
security.intro: We take the security of your data very seriously. Our systems are secured with:

items.1: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transfer

gks.title: 5. GKS & Fiscal Compliance
gks.content: Vysion Horeca is fully GKS-certified and complies with all Belgian fiscal requirements. Transaction data is securely stored in accordance with legal retention periods.

sharing.title: 6. Sharing data
sharing.content: We only share your data with third parties when necessary for our services (such as payment processors) or when legally required. We never sell your data to third parties.

items.1: Request access to your personal data
items.2: Have your data corrected or deleted
items.4: Transfer your data to another service

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses functional cookies to improve performance. Analytical cookies are only placed with your consent.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.intro: For questions about this privacy statement or your data, you can contact us at:

changes.title: 10. Changes
changes.content: We may adjust this privacy statement from time to time. The most recent version is always available on this page. Last updated: December 2025.

definitions.title: 1. Definitions
definitions.content: In this data processing agreement, the following terms apply:
definitions.controllerDef: the customer using Vysion Horeca services
definitions.personalDataDef: all data relating to an identified or identifiable natural person

subject.title: 2. Subject and Duration
subject.content: This agreement governs the processing of personal data by Vysion Horeca on your behalf. The agreement is in effect as long as you use our services.

items.1: Providing POS software and related services
items.3: Maintaining customer data and order history

items.1: Process personal data only according to your instructions
items.2: Take appropriate technical and organizational measures
items.4: Assist you in meeting your GDPR obligations
items.5: Delete or return data upon termination

subprocessors.title: 6. Subprocessors
subprocessors.content: We use subprocessors for certain services. A current list is available on our subprocessors page. We inform you of changes.

security.title: 7. Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures including encryption, access control, and regular security audits.

breach.title: 8. Data Breaches
breach.content: In case of a data breach, we inform you without undue delay so you can meet your notification obligations.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: For questions about this agreement, please contact us at

availability.title: 1. Availability
availability.content: Vysion Horeca guarantees 99.9% uptime for all core services. This excludes scheduled maintenance, which is announced in advance.

maintenance.title: 2. Scheduled Maintenance
maintenance.content: Scheduled maintenance takes place outside peak hours, preferably between 02:00 and 06:00 CET. Customers are informed at least 48 hours in advance.

channels.title: 4. Support Channels
channels.inAppDesc: Available in the Vysion Horeca application

backups.title: 6. Backups
backups.content: All data is backed up daily. Backups are kept for 30 days. In case of data loss, we can restore from the most recent backup.

updates.title: 7. Updates
updates.content: Software updates are rolled out automatically, usually at night. Important updates are communicated in advance.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: This Acceptable Use Policy describes the rules for using Vysion Horeca services. By using our services, you agree to this policy.

allowed.title: Permitted Use
allowed.intro: You may use our services to:

prohibited.title: Prohibited Use
prohibited.intro: It is prohibited to use our services for:

items.5: Collecting data from other users without consent

enforcement.title: Enforcement
enforcement.content: Violation of this policy may result in suspension or termination of your account. In serious cases, we may take legal action.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions, please contact us at

brands.title: Our Brands
brands.intro: The following brand names and logos are property of Vysion Group International:

items.5: The Vysion logo and all variants

allowed.title: Permitted Use
allowed.intro: You may use our brand names to:

items.1: Refer to our products or services in text
items.2: Indicate that you use Vysion Horeca in your business
items.3: Write reviews or articles about our services

items.1: Use our logos without written permission
items.2: Use our brand names in your company or product name
items.3: Create the impression that you are sponsored or endorsed by us
items.4: Register our brand names as domain names or social media handles
items.5: Modify our brands or combine them with other elements

logoGuidelines.title: Logo Guidelines
logoGuidelines.intro: If you have permission to use our logo, please follow these guidelines:

items.1: Only use official logo files that we provide
items.2: Do not change colors or proportions
items.3: Ensure sufficient white space around the logo
items.4: Do not place the logo on busy backgrounds

permission.title: Request Permission
permission.content: For permission to use our brand names or logos, please contact us at

ownership.title: 1. Vysion Ownership
ownership.content: All intellectual property rights regarding Vysion Horeca software, including but not limited to source code, designs, logos, brand names and documentation, are and remain the property of Vysion Group International.

license.title: 2. License
license.content: By subscribing, you receive a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the software for your business operations. This license ends when the subscription is terminated.

items.1: Copy, modify or reverse-engineer the software
items.4: Use our brand names or logos without permission

yourContent.title: 4. Your Content
yourContent.content: You retain all rights to your own business data, product information and customer data. You grant us a license to process this data for providing our services.

infringement.title: 5. Infringement Reports
infringement.content: If you suspect intellectual property rights are being infringed, please contact us. We take such reports seriously and will take appropriate action.

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.content: For questions about intellectual property, please contact us at

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: This agreement describes the terms for using payment services via the Vysion Horeca platform. Payment processing is done through our partners Mollie and Stripe.

processing.title: 2. Payment Processing
processing.content: Vysion Horeca integrates with certified payment processors to ensure secure transactions. All transactions are encrypted and comply with PCI-DSS standards.

fees.title: 4. Transaction Fees
fees.content: Transaction fees are determined by the payment processor and depend on the payment method and transaction volume. Contact us for current rates.

payouts.title: 5. Payouts
payouts.content: Received payments are automatically paid out to your business bank account. Payout frequency is configurable (daily, weekly or monthly).

chargebacks.title: 6. Chargebacks and Disputes
chargebacks.content: In case of a chargeback, you receive a notification and have the opportunity to provide evidence. We support you in handling payment disputes.

security.title: 7. Security
security.content: All payment data is processed in accordance with PCI-DSS Level 1. Card data is never stored on our servers.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: For questions about payments, please contact us at

subprocessorsPage.title: Subprocessors
subprocessorsPage.intro: Vysion Horeca uses the following subprocessors to provide our services. All subprocessors are carefully selected and comply with GDPR requirements.

changes.title: Changes
changes.content: We inform our customers of changes to the list of subprocessors. If you object to a new subprocessor, you can contact us.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about our subprocessors, please contact us at

general.title: 1. General
general.content: This Service Agreement ("Agreement") applies to the use of Vysion Horeca services, part of Vysion Group International. By using our services, you agree to these terms.

services.title: 2. Services
services.content: Vysion Horeca provides POS software, online ordering platform, accounting software and related services for the hospitality sector. We reserve the right to modify, expand or limit our services.

subscription.title: 3. Subscription and Payment
subscription.intro: Access to our services is available through monthly or annual subscription. Payments are invoiced in advance and are non-refundable unless otherwise stated.

items.1: Invoices are sent monthly or annually
items.2: Payment term is 14 days from invoice date
items.3: Access may be suspended for non-payment

usage.title: 4. Use of Services
usage.content: You are responsible for lawful use of our services. It is prohibited to use the services for illegal purposes, infringe intellectual property rights, or disrupt the services.

privacy.title: 5. Data and Privacy
privacy.content: We process your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy and applicable legislation, including GDPR. You retain ownership of your business data.

liability.title: 6. Liability
liability.content: Vysion Horeca is not liable for indirect damage, consequential damage or lost profits. Our total liability is limited to the amount you have paid us in the past 12 months.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period. We may terminate the agreement for breach of these terms.

law.title: 8. Applicable Law
law.content: Belgian law applies to this agreement. Disputes are submitted to the competent court in Belgium.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: For questions about this agreement, please contact us at

troubleshootingPage.title: Troubleshooting & Help
troubleshootingPage.subtitle: Common problems and solutions for your Vysion Horeca POS

1.question: My POS won't start
1.answer:
1. Check if the device is connected to power
  2. Hold the power button for 10 seconds to restart
  3. Check if all cables are properly connected
  4. Wait 2 minutes and try again
  5. If the problem persists, contact support

2.question: I can't log into my POS
2.answer:
1. Check if you're using the correct PIN
  2. Ask your administrator to reset your PIN
  3. Check if your account is not blocked (after 5 failed attempts)
  4. Contact support if you don't have access to an admin account

3.question: The payment terminal doesn't work
3.answer:
1. Check if the terminal is turned on (green light is on)
  2. Check the USB or Bluetooth connection
  3. Restart the terminal by turning it off and on
  4. Go to Settings ‚Üí Payment Terminal ‚Üí Reconnect
  5. Check if your internet connection is working

4.question: Receipt printer doesn't print
4.answer:
1. Check if there is paper in the printer
  2. Open and close the printer cover (this resets the printer)
  3. Check the USB/network connection
  4. Go to Settings ‚Üí Printers ‚Üí Test print
  5. If the test page doesn't print, restart the printer

5.question: My POS is slow
5.answer:
1. Close apps you're not using
  2. Check your internet connection (4G/WiFi)
  3. Restart the POS application
  4. Check if updates are available
  5. Contact support if the problem persists

6.question: Online orders aren't coming in
6.answer:
1. Check if your internet connection is working
  2. Check if the online ordering module is enabled
  3. Go to Settings ‚Üí Online Ordering ‚Üí Sync
  4. Check if your location is "open" in the system
  5. Check your opening hours in settings

7.question: I want to add or edit a product
7.answer:
1. Go to the menu top left ‚Üí Products
  2. Click "New product" or select an existing product
  3. Fill in the name, price and category
  4. Click "Save"
  5. The product is now available on your POS

8.question: How do I make a Z-report / day closing?
8.answer:
1. Go to the menu top left ‚Üí Reports
  2. Select "Z-Report" or "Day Closing"
  3. Check the details
  4. Click "Close and print"
  5. The report is printed and the day is closed

9.question: I forgot my password
9.answer:
1. Go to the login page
  2. Click "Forgot password"
  3. Enter your email address
  4. You will receive a link to reset your password
  5. Or contact support: +32 492 12 93 83

10.question: The app keeps crashing
10.answer:
1. Close the app completely
  2. Restart your device
  3. Check if you have the latest version of the app
  4. Remove and reinstall the app (your data is preserved)
  5. Contact support if the problem persists

stillNeedHelp.title: Problem not found?
stillNeedHelp.subtitle: Our support team is available 24/7. Don't hesitate to contact us!
